title: Bird
description: Key fields for a Bird entry

name.description: Capitalise each letter, and use dashes for descriptive terms, e.g. 'White-throated'

family_name.description: The grouping or collective name for this bird, e.g. a Booted Eagle's family name is 'Eagle'

german_name.description: The common name for this bird in German

afrikaans_name.description: The common name for this bird in Afrikaans

genus.description: The first part of this bird's scientific name, e.g. 'Batis' in 'Batis capensis'

species.description: The second part of this bird's scientific name, e.g. 'capensis' in 'Batis capensis'

ebird.description: A canonical URL on eBird for this bird. Add a 'ZA' suffix to the URL please

wikipedia.description: A canonical URL on WikiPedia for this bird

red-list.description: The IUCN classification for this bird. See `src/_data/red-list.yml`

hidden.description: If set to 'true', then this bird hasn't been sighted or photographed. Useful for representing this bird as an opportunity to be seen in the area.
